body_html:
@andrewharp no, I manually added libandroid_tensorflow_inference_java.jar and the other .so files to my libs/ folder, and this to build.gradle:

android {
    ...
    sourceSets {
        main {
            jniLibs.srcDirs = ['libs']
        }
    }
}
dependencies {
    compile fileTree(dir: "libs", include: ["*.jar"])
    compile 'com.facebook.react:react-native:+'
}

Is there a way I can install the library automatically in build.gradle?
